blogPost.excerpt: HelloScribe Guru can write a draft on just about any topic - in seconds. Automated writing for long-form content has never been faster, easier, or more convenient. Get off the blank page - say bye-bye writer's block!
blogPost.body: HelloScribe Guru can write a draft on just about any topic - in seconds. Automated writing for long-form content has never been faster, easier, or more convenient. Get off the blank page - say bye-bye writer's block!
blogPost.title: HelloScribe Guru - Your AI-powered article writer - for real.
blogPost.author: George Prendergast

localize.description: HelloScribe Guru可以在几秒钟内写出关于任何主题的草稿。自动写作的长篇内容从来没有更快，更容易，或更方便。脱离空白页--告别作家的块垒
HelloScribe Guru可以在幾秒鐘內寫出關於任何主題的草稿。自動寫作的長篇內容從來沒有更快，更容易，或更方便。脫離空白頁--告別作家的塊壘

previous.excerpt: Beam makes it easy to get paid to text your biggest fans. Send premium paid content, images, or videos directly to your monthly paying subscribers.
previous.title: Beam - Get paid to delight your followers via text

localize.description: Beam让您轻松获得报酬，向您的忠实粉丝发送短信。直接向您的月度付费用户发送高级付费内容、图片或视频。
localize.tagline: 通过文字获得报酬，让您的追随者高兴

localize.description: Beam讓您輕鬆獲得報酬，向您的忠實粉絲髮送短信。直接向您的月度付費用戶發送高級付費內容、圖片或視頻。
localize.tagline: 通過文字獲得報酬，讓您的追隨者高興

next.excerpt: Keka wants to be an easy to use little app, well integrated in macOS and very powerful. And it is. You can compress files in all common (and not that common) formats and uncompress almost every format file, with and without encryption.
next.title: Keka - The macOS file archiver

localize.description: Keka希望成为一个易于使用的小程序，很好地集成在macOS中，并且非常强大。而它也确实如此。你可以压缩所有常见（和不常见）格式的文件，并解压几乎所有格式的文件，有加密和不加密。
Keka希望成爲一個易於使用的小程序，很好地集成在macOS中，並且非常強大。而它也確實如此。你可以壓縮所有常見（和不常見）格式的文件，並解壓幾乎所有格式的文件，有加密和不加密。
